text_block_list.text: During training…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hello. I hope you don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehh?! B-Bourbon?!
She's going to be your training partner.
She's going to be your training partner.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Just for today, we are teammates. If you'll have me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Umm…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice, the training I'm accustomed to is, according to others, 
"demonic".

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But seeing as you've defeated me before, you should be able to keep 
up. Let's make today worth it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hwehh!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No, not "hweh." Now then, let us begin. First up, four uphill dashes.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-okay!
Rice takes off running as if being hounded by Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Well, I'd better get to it myself. The Tenno Sho is nearly upon us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I simply cannot wait to run alongside Rice. Aren't you excited too, 
Trainer?
McQueen looks at me with a wry smile.
I take that to mean I'd better convince Rice to compete.
choice_data_list: She'll run. I'll make sure of it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I trust that you will.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, say what? Rice is gonna be in the Tenno Sho too?! Oh boy, I 
gotta get the word out!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
H-hey, what are you—? Wait just a minute! This isn't supposed to be 
public yet!
Our special training session gets off to a lively start.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
As I expected, you've kept up with my "demonic" training. And now 
for the final exercise.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Rice, I want you to race me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? …Race you?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You bested me in the Kikuka Sho. It shouldn't be an unreasonable 
task.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But, but I…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Having seen such a powerful performance from you, I find your 
timidness rather unexpected.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
In the Kikuka Sho, you had me in your sights from the start, and never 
let me escape for even a second.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You worked hard to beat me, and your running showed it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: And now, I am working hard in order to beat you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However… In your current state, I won't actually need to work hard at 
all to win.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I don't want that. The Rice I know isn't someone I could best without 
putting in the work.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: So run, Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Just like you did in that race, show me that you want to win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Want… to win…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I love running… but I just can't seem to win. And when I see McQueen 
race—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I… I want to win too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
…That's right. That's the whole reason why I switched teams, why I 
trained so hard…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even if some people don't like it when I win, I… I want…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to win!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I see you've finally found your drive again. Well then, let's finish our 
training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh? Rice and Bourbon are going at it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice is keeping her eyes forward now.
She remembered why she wants to win—who she wants to win against.
She remembered why she wants to win—who she wants to win against.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Indeed.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: All right, I'm gonna go be their ref!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (She's so fast! Faster than in the Kikuka Sho…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (She trained hard… because she wanted to win against me.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (The crowd refused to recognize me, but she did.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (And I can't let her down!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yahhh!

I see that same ambition she exuded in the Kikuka Sho. The drive to 
win pushes her forward.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: There it is! Rice Shower wins!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… Phew.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …Rice, you ran well. Even better than you did in the Kikuka Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon… I did it… I remembered what it was like to want to win 
against you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
And I was able to see your running firsthand again. It seems I have 
much more training to do.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Our next meeting will be in the Twinkle Series… as unparalleled 
rivals.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah… Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I, um… I'll run in the Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to win. Even if it's an important race for McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh. I wouldn't have it any other way.
choice_data_list: Then we'd better get training, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Yes!

Rice has decided to rise to the challenge once more. The Tenno Sho 
awaits.
